name: 22c3ef58-9355-5825-8950-765b050e7018
notes: This dataset provides climatologies for ozone and carbon monoxyde over a decade (2001-2010). Two types of climatologies are available: with 10 fixed pressure levels (from 288 hPa to 186 hPa) or with 4 dynamic pressure levels (lower stratosphere, upper statisphere, tropopause, upper troposphere).
title: IAGOS Climatologies
